description: Public Services and Procurement Canada is looking for a Contractor to provide privacy-related services supporting effective implementation of projects and operational requirements. The overall goal is to comply with all privacy policy requirements and to enhance privacy posturing of the Pay Program and compliance with PSPCs Directive on Privacy Management.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Business Consultant Senior Position**
------------------------------------------

### Invitation to Tender

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites interested contractors to submit a bid for the provision of business consulting services as a Senior Consultant.

### Tender Information

| *Item* | *Description* |
| --- | --- |
| **Tender Reference #:** | cb-5886-98798842 |
| **Amendment Number:** | 1 |
| **Solicitation Number:** | 10076238/A |
| **Publication Date:** | May 25, 2023 |
| **Tender Closing Date:** | June 9, 2023, 14:00:00 |
| **Trade Agreements:** | *Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement*, *Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)*, ..., *Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)* |
| **Regions of Opportunity:** | National Capital Region (NCR) |
| **Regions of Delivery:** | National Capital Region (NCR) |
| **Contracting Entity Name:** | Public Services and Procurement Canada |
| **Contracting Entity Address:** | 11 Laurier, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada |

### RFP Details

The PSPC seeks a contractor to provide various business consulting services, including the development of corporate objectives and policies, productivity or efficiency studies, application implementation, and risk management processes, in support of the implementation of projects and operational requirements.

### Selection Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Tenders

The bid submission deadline is June 9, 2023, 14:00:00. The tender notice can be accessed on the Canada buys website at the address [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5886/npp---rfp-10076238-a.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5886/npp---rfp-10076238-a.pdf).

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

* DANIEL MICHAUD
* Email: daniel.michaud@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: 613-858-8483
* Fax: (None) 

### Note
